Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Spaulding
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Augusta. Western and Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Augusta. Western, then resume their normal route on Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Spaulding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Drexel
ShortDescription: #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Woodlawn and 63rd due to police activity on 63rd/Drexel.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Woodlawn, then resume their normal route on 63rd due to police activity on 63rd/Drexel.

Allow extra travel time.
